Name: Issue 258
Introduction: Hey Everyone. Sorry the newsletter is late this week - I blame the Corona Virus. But we have a truck load of videos and interesting articles.  Stay safe and have a great weekend. ❤ Kym

Articles.Title: Xamarin Customer Showcase: PGS Software + Volotea
Articles.Description: Cross-platform, mobile applications are the way of the future, especially when it comes to travel. We sat down with Boguslaw Blonski from PGS Software, who explains how they took Volotea to new heights with Xamarin. As well as the inspiration behind the project and what the future holds.
Articles.Author: Jayme Singleton

Articles.Title: Default Interface Methods in C#
Articles.Description: c# 8 allows developers to write a default implementation for the methods in the interfaces. I consider this feature as a high-risk language feature one as it can be easily misused that will lead to catastrophic code quality. In this article, we will discuss the correct use of this feature.
Articles.Author: Ahmed Fouad

Articles.Title: Crashes and errors analytics with App Center and Application Insights
Articles.Description: For this blog post, John Thiriet covers export analytics data from your mobile application from App Center to Application Insights.
Articles.Author: John Thiriet

Articles.Title: Generate an universal Apk from your Android App Bundle using Azure DevOps
Articles.Description: Since Google introduced Android App Bundle, it becomes the new standard to distribute your Android application accross the stores. It allows us to generate a specific version of our application for any device, with only the recourses this device needs.

Articles.Title: Contact Sharing in Xamarin Forms
Articles.Description: In this article, Charlin shows you how to share a contact by creating a vCard and sharing it using Xamarin Essentials.
Articles.Author: Charlin Agramonte

Articles.Title: Links Preview Control for Xamarin Forms
Articles.Description: Lorenzo was sending a link in WhatsApp to a friend and realized when you enter a link it shows a preview, after seeing it he started to wonder how to make something similar in Xamarin.Forms.
Articles.Author: Lorenzo Araujo

Articles.Title: Implementation of the Cognitive Services + Xamarin Combo Challenge!
Articles.Description: There was a recent Xamarin Challenge for Cognitive Services and Xamarin.Forms.  In this post, Bohdan discusses his experiences.
Articles.Author: Bohdan Benetskyi

Articles.Title: Xamarin.Forms Custom Fonts Simplified & Everywhere
Articles.Description: In Xamarin.Forms 4.6 custom fonts got easier with Embedded Fonts and IconFont2Code.
Articles.Author: James Montemagno

Articles.Title: Animate Anything with Xamarin.Forms
Articles.Description: James, plays with Custom Animations in Xamarin.Forms to create a nice little loading animation for his twitch project.
Articles.Author: James Montemagno

Articles.Title: Xamarin and Bluetooth Mesh Networks
Articles.Description: Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) is what you are using to pair your phone to the awesome little Xamarin Bluetooth speaker that we all picked up at a Xamarin conference.
Articles.Author: Robin Schroeder

Articles.Title: SomeTips for UI Handling!
Articles.Description: Leomaris drops some tips for working with Xamarin.Forms UIs
Articles.Author: Leomaris Reyes

Articles.Title: Icon Fonts made Easy
Articles.Description: Coming from a Pre-Xamarin background of web development, I have always loved fonts like Font Awesome. Naturally I was pretty excited that Xamarin.Forms finally added a FontImageSource to make it easier to use Font based Icons, but it still frankly was a pain to use.
Articles.Author: Dan Siegel

Articles.Title: Fixing small text on iOS WKWebView’s in Xamarin.Forms
Articles.Description: Matt Crombie, shows how to to fix an issue with tiny text in the webview on iOS.
Articles.Author: Matt Crombie

Articles.Title: CoordinatorLayout.Forms
Articles.Description: CoordinatorLayout.XamarinForms A custom control for Xamarin.Forms, that shows an expanding top view and a scrollable bottom view. It is a reproduction of Android's CoordinatorLayout.
Articles.Author: Marius Muntean

Articles.Title: Adaptive UI with Xamarin.Forms
Articles.Description: In this video Javier talks about how to create adaptive and responsive UI's in Xamarin.Forms.
Articles.Author: Javier Suárez

Articles.Title: Xamarin.Forms 101: Accessibility using Automation Properties
Articles.Description: This week Xamarin.Forms 101 takes a look at how to make your Xamarin.Forms apps more accessible using Automation Properties.
Articles.Author: James Montemagno

Articles.Title: Essential Nuget packages for your .NET projects. With Michael Stonis
Articles.Description: On this episode of DevTalk Kerry speaks to Michael Stonis about essential Nuget packages for your .NET projects.
Articles.Author: Kerry Lothrop

Articles.Title: Essentials 1.6, Forms 4.6 and Contact Tracing
Articles.Description: Have a listen to the Xamarin podcast to learn about all the new hotness in Xamarin.Forms releases.

Articles.Title: Visual State Manger - Beyond the Basics | The Xamarin Show
Articles.Description: This week, James is joined by friend of the show Gerald Versluis, Xamarin.Forms Engineer, who shows off one of the coolest feature ever for app developers and library creators, the new improved VisualStateManager.
Articles.Author: James Montemagno

Articles.Title: Xamarin: .NET Community Standup - May 7th 2020 - Xamarin.Forms 4.6 Launch
Articles.Description: Join the Mobile .NET Teams for our community standup covering great community contributions for Mobile .NET, Xamarin, Xamarin.Forms, Components, and more. Lots of great stuff covered.
Articles.Author: Xamarin Developers

Articles.Title: 200: Have We Reached Peak Merge Conflict?
Articles.Description: 200 episodes of Merge Conflict, woah! Congrats to James and Frank for an awesome achievement!

Articles.Title: Exposure Notification API Support for Xamarin Apps
Articles.Description: Last month, Apple and Google announced plans for creating Exposure Notification APIs. By leveraging Bluetooth Low Energy, this help developers implement contact tracing for both iOS and Android. Our team has been tracking the releases of these APIs to ready them for Xamarin developers.
Articles.Author: Jon Dick

Articles.Title: Virtual Xamarin and .NET Events in May
Articles.Description: Check out the latest virtual events, streams, and videos to watch this May – all from the comfort of home.
Articles.Author: Jayme Singleton
